title: Fix scroll position not resetting to top on navigation

requirements.text: Ensure that when a user navigates to a different route by clicking any internal link (header nav, footer links, in-page CTAs), the destination page loads scrolled to the top (window scroll position resets to 0,0).

quotes: when i click on any link it doesnt open the page from the top. so fix this issue.

acceptanceCriteria: From any page scrolled down, clicking a header navigation link (e.g., Services, About Us, Contact Us) navigates to the new route and places the user at the top of the page.
From any page scrolled down, clicking a footer quick link navigates to the new route and places the user at the top of the page.
From the Home page, clicking CTA links (e.g., "Get a Quote", "View Services") navigates and places the user at the top of the destination page.
The behavior applies consistently across all current routes: /, /about, /services, /tracking, /contact.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Do not change the site’s visual design or layout beyond what is required to fix scroll-to-top behavior.
Do not implement browser back/forward scroll restoration behavior unless it is required to satisfy the user’s request.
